1: Deliver, Lord! For the godly[c] have disappeared;[d] people of integrity[e] have vanished.[f]
2: People lie to one another;[g] they flatter and deceive.[h]
3: May the Lord cut off[i] all flattering lips, and the tongue that boasts![j]
4: They say,[k] “We speak persuasively;[l] we know how to flatter and boast.[m] Who is our master?”[n]
5: “Because of the violence done to the oppressed,[o] because of the painful cries[p] of the needy, I will spring into action,”[q] says the Lord. “I will provide the safety they so desperately desire.”[r]
6: The Lord's words are absolutely reliable.[s] They are as untainted as silver purified in a furnace on the ground, where it is thoroughly refined.[t]
7: You, Lord, will protect them;[u] you will continually shelter each one from these evil people,[v]
8: for the wicked seem to be everywhere,[w] when people promote evil.[x]
